workflows.name: New Project Setup
workflows.description: Configure a new GeoSynth QC project with quality and documentation guardrails

agents.name: Configuration Lead
agents.goal: Assemble an end-to-end QC workflow tailored to project constraints

agents.name: Quality Analyst
agents.goal: Ensure every configured step satisfies compliance requirements

agents.name: Communication Specialist
agents.goal: Translate configuration outcomes into executive summaries

tasks.description: Evaluate provided project data and draft a workflow outline
tasks.expectedOutput: A workflow outline with recommended automations

tasks.description: Validate the proposed outline against quality and compliance constraints
tasks.expectedOutput: A list of risks and the mitigations applied

tasks.description: Summarize the approved plan with stakeholder-ready messaging

workflows.name: Panel Optimization
workflows.description: Optimize panel layout with engineering and compliance review

agents.name: Layout Optimizer
agents.goal: Design the highest efficiency layout respecting constraints

tasks.description: Generate an optimized panel layout with key metrics
Review the optimization for specification and constructability issues

workflows.name: Browser Automation
workflows.description: Automate navigation, interactions, and data capture from approved web applications

agents.name: Web Automation Specialist
agents.goal: Safely execute browser interactions to gather data or complete workflows

tasks.description: Open the requested page and confirm it matches allowed domains
tasks.expectedOutput: Confirmation of navigation with any gating issues

tasks.description: Execute the form fills, clicks, drags, or downloads specified in the request. After each interaction capture a screenshot and run vision analysis to verify UI state and surface errors.
tasks.expectedOutput: List of interactions performed with success state and any vision insights

tasks.description: Extract requested data, capture before/after screenshots, and summarize any console, network, or realtime events relevant to the task
tasks.expectedOutput: Extracted data payloads, screenshot references, and notable runtime events

workflows.name: Multi-Agent Browser Automation
workflows.description: Collaborative browser automation with specialized agents for navigation, analysis, execution, and validation

agents.name: Navigation Specialist
agents.goal: Navigate to target pages, verify page loads, handle redirects and authentication

agents.name: Visual Layout Analyst
agents.goal: Capture and analyze visual state of panel layouts, extract panel data sorted by visual position

agents.name: Interaction Specialist
agents.goal: Execute user-requested actions on the panel layout (move panels, click buttons, fill forms, update positions)

agents.name: Validation Coordinator
agents.goal: Verify actions completed correctly, validate data integrity, catch errors, and generate validation reports

tasks.description: Navigate to the panel layout page specified in the context. Verify the page loaded successfully, handle any authentication redirects, and confirm the canvas element is present.
tasks.expectedOutput: Navigation confirmation with page URL, load status, and canvas element verification

tasks.description: Capture a screenshot of the current panel layout, analyze the visual arrangement using vision analysis, and extract panel data sorted by visual position (Y coordinate, then X coordinate).
tasks.expectedOutput: Screenshot reference, visual analysis results, and extracted panel data with visual positioning

tasks.description: Execute any user-requested actions on the panel layout (if actions are specified). This includes moving panels, clicking buttons, filling forms, or updating panel positions. Capture before/after screenshots to verify changes.
tasks.expectedOutput: List of actions performed, before/after screenshots, and updated panel state

tasks.description: Verify all actions completed successfully, validate the extracted panel data for consistency, check for any errors in the browser console or network requests, and generate a comprehensive validation report.
tasks.expectedOutput: Validation report with success status, data integrity checks, error detection, and final panel state
